name: They Dug Too Deep
description:
The Dwarves have long mined the mountain they live in. Ever down, ever for greater wealth. Dangers have always been present, from fungal spores that zombify dwarves, to clans of angry feral goblins. The giant spiders and cave crawlers were dangerous, but manageable. But now…now the Dwarves have released something. But what else would you expect, since… They Dug Too Deep.

-Take control of the dwarf who said, “Not I” the slowest and explore what was released in the depths of the mines.

-Fight goblins, spiders, zombies, rogue automatons, & then deal with the forces of hell that your dwarven delving unleashed. Plus what is lurking... beneath.

-Use various dwarven contraptions to stem the endless tide. From Crystal scatter guns, to crank action lightning guns, hydraulic morning stars, gas powered goblin skewerers, and even a handful of -shudder- elven spells.

-Emblazon yourself with powerful runes to empower your dwarven blood!

-How deep can you get?
